attributes.name: Attempt to Revoke Okta API Token v102.0.1
attributes.description: Identifies attempts to revoke an Okta API token. An adversary may attempt to revoke or delete an Okta API token to disrupt an organization's business operations.
author: Elastic
false_positives: If the behavior of revoking Okta API tokens is expected, consider adding exceptions to this rule to filter false positives.
attributes.setup: The Okta Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
